original_title: Pier Paolo Pasolini e la ragione di un sogno
overview: Through interviews, archive footage and quotes from books and films by Pasolini, Laura Betti, friend, actress and collaborator of Pasolini, improvises as a director, making a feature film dreaming of Pier Paolo's words immersed in everything that has not involved him for a long time
title: Pier Paolo Pasolini and the Reason of a Dream
